    Function reference

    All functions

    add_column_ald_sector_to_financial_data()
    Map the columns (company_id, ald_sector) from companies data to the financial data where applicable (through a left join)
    add_columns_financial_averages()
    Add financial averages columns to the data in order, f rom most granular to less granular
    add_market_share_columns()
    Add market share columns to a scenario dataset
    aggregate_equity_ownership()
    aggregate volumes of equity_ownership over duplicated rows
    aggregate_financial_indicators()
    Applies the create_averages_eikon() function with minimum tolerance, effectively aggregating all financial indicators on the grp_cols columns
    aggregate_indicator_types()
    Aggregate financial data indicator types using dummies. This does NOT return dummies as boolean, but as the sum of all indicator types when grouped by company_id.
    aggregate_over_locations()
    Sum productions and emissions over all other columns. This is done to aggregate those metrics over the different countries in a region where a company operates in.
    aggregate_over_technology_types()
    Sum production and EF values over all columns except technology type.
    apply_geographies_renaming_rules()
    Title
    compute_financial_averages()
    compute averages on sector/region , sector, global, using the create_averages_eikon() function TODO global/region
    create_automotive_prices()
    Create automotive prices
    create_averages_eikon()
    Create averages of eikon variables for companies with missing values
    create_emissions_factor_ratio()
    convert EF from tCO2 (or tCO2e) to the ratio of tCO2 (or tCO2e) over production
    create_missing_year_rows()
    Create new rows replicating the nesting columns for each year of the desired scope not present. New rows have NA values for columns outside nesting.
    create_plan_prod_columns()
    rename columns, and sum ald_production over each company to create plan_sec_prod column
    degrees()
    Insert the symbol for degrees
    .sum_or_all_nans()
    Sum values by skipping nans, or return nan if all values are nan (instead of 0 with sum(... na.rm=T))
    drop_always_empty_production()
    Drop rows where production is always NA or 0 over the time period
    dropbox_exists()
    Does this computer have a local copy of 2dii's dropbox folder?
    expand_by_scenario_geography()
    Duplicate rows according to the available geographies
    fill_missing_emission_factor()
    use avg EFs per ald_business_unit to fill missing values
    fill_partially_missing_values()
    Fill ald_production and emissions_factor for a given ald_business_unit at a company with values of previous years, or with interpolation for values in the middle, or 0 for values in previous years.
    filter_countries_coverage()
    Filter companies by country
    filter_sectors_abcd_data()
    Filter dataframe to keep only desired sectors
    filter_years_abcd_data()
    filter to keep only desired years Filtering years and fill/create missing years is done independantly, because other cleaning steps
    format_p4i()
    Format scenario data for P4I
    get_all_unique_geographies()
    Title
    get_missing_companies_in_financial_data()
    Anti join the financial data with companies data to create new rows in the financial data for the missing companies.
    group_identical_geographies()
    GROUP IDENTICAL GEOGRAPHIES
    identify_indicator_provenance()
    Aggregate indicator columns to differentiate between raw and averages Since financial features for 1 company are obtained from multiple countries aggregated, the "purity" of an indicator is expressed as the ratio of raw values over total (averaged +raw)
    interpolate_yearly()
    Interpolate values in a dataset, by year.
    keep_available_financial_companies_in_ownership_tree()
    company_id in the ownership tree refer to the company owning the target_company_id
    load_trisk_inputs()
    Title
    match_closest_financial_data_to_missing_companies()
    Use the ownership tree to assign raw eikon financial data to a subsidiary company when it doesn't own any financial information in the raw data
    match_emissions_to_production()
    Merge production and emissions data. Filter rows where the production unit and emission unit match as expected
    match_location_to_region()
    Decrease regional granularity by matching the ald_location countries in financial data to macro regions
    path_dropbox_2dii()
    Easily access directories in your local copy of 2dii's Dropbox folder
    pivot_equity_ownership_columns()
    pivot values of Equity Ownership, to be used as yearly production/emissions TODO when Direct Ownership is not nan, use it when Equity Ownership is nan ?
    prepare_abcd_data()
    Creates the abcd stress test input data, using companies emissions and productions. Aggregate absolute values of production and emissions over ald_business_unit types and regions. Computes the emissions factor ratio out of absolute emissions and productions.
    prepare_asset_impact_data()
    Prepare Asset Impact data before transformation to abcd
    prepare_capacity_factors_NGFS2023()
    This function reads in raw ngfs capacity and secondary energy data, as found in the dropbox under "Raw Data" and creates capacity factors for the power sector. and prepares these in the format required in the stress test.
    prepare_financial_data()
    Main financial data preparation script
    prepare_geco2023()
    Function reads GECO2023 raw automotive data and wrangles it into the required Format.
    prepare_lcoe_adjusted_price_data_oxford2022()
    This function reads in the price data from Oxford and calculates the LCOE for the power sector.
    prepare_lcoe_adjusted_price_data_weo()
    This function reads in the long format prepared price data from IEA scenarios that contain the LCOE for the power sector. It then derives implied market prices. This is done by adding the average net profit margin of the 100 largest power companies we can find on top of the costs of the start year. The absolute margin in that year is then added to all following years as well. We adjust the price by calculating the cost changes for each technology and scenario as lcoe_t0 / lcoe_t and applying the resulting cost factor to the absolute profit margin in each year. This means that if costs increase, the absolute average profit margin will be smaller over time, whereas falling costs will increase the absolute profit margin over time.
    prepare_ngfs_carbon_price()
    This function reads carbon price data sourced from the NGFS scenario selector tool and prepares it for use in the r2dii.climate.stress.test package. Gaps between years are interpolated.
    prepare_prewrangled_capacity_factors_WEO2021()
    This function reads scenario data in the form of data as found in the dropbox under "Raw Data", extracts the relevant information for power capacity factors and prepares these in the format required in the stress test. Currently expects to get data for up to year 2040.
    prepare_prewrangled_capacity_factors_WEO2023()
    WEO2023 This function reads prewrangled weo2023 capacity and net generation data for APS, STEPS and NZ scenarios under the Global geography
    prepare_price_data_long_NGFS2023()
    This function reads raw NGFS price data files from 2021 in and wrangles it to fit the format to be used in the transition risk stress test work flow.
    prepare_price_data_long_WEO2021()
    This function reads in multiple price data files from WEO2021 and wrangles it to fit the format to be used in the transition risk stress test work flow.
    prepare_scenario_data()
    This function reads scenario data in the form of data as found in the dropbox under "Processed Data" and wrangles it to fit the required format for the stress test.
    prepare_scenario_data_weo23()
    WEO2023 preparation 2023 vintage has only global data
    preprepare_ngfs_scenario_data()
    This function reads NGFS raw scenario data as found in the dropbox under "Processed Data" and wrangles it to fit the required format for the usual scenario analysis input routine.
    production_types
    Used to generate company synthetic datasets TODO remove to be
    read_asset_resolution()
    read Asset Resolution data
    regroup_and_rename_geographies()
    Title
    remove_implausible_values_in_financial_indicators()
    Lower or equal for min value (0) Stricly higher for the max value (npm==1 is allowed)
    remove_prop_emissions()
    Filtering emissions to remove emissions in proportions in order to aggregate the raw values and re-compute the proportions
    remove_unknown_owner_companies()
    Filter out companies with unknown owner
    rename_ald_sector()
    rename ald_sector column according to some rules
    rename_bench_region_geographies()
    apply a function to rename a vector of characters, and apply the mapping on the original column
    rename_column_values()
    Apply a rename mapping on a tibble column
    rename_stress_test_inputs()
    Title
    rename_technology()
    rename technology column according to some rules
    report_diff_rows()
    Identify how many rows are added or removed due to a specific operation
    report_duplicates()
    Report duplicate rows
    report_missing_col_combinations()
    Identify and report missing value combinations
    report_missings()
    Report missing
    scenarios_geographies
    available geographies in the stress test
    select_final_financial_value_using_averages()
    For each company select the final financial value of the best granularity
    standardize_geoographies_name()
    Title
    synthetic_company_activities
    GENERATE COMPANY ACTIVITY
    synthetic_company_emissions
    GENERATE COMPANY EMISSIONS generated from company_activities
